original_text: You will never see those cruel people again. You could not understand their language. They laughed at you with strange words. You will never see those cruel people again. You could not understand their language. They laughed at you with strange words. You will never see those cruel people again. You could not understand their language. They laughed at you with strange words. You will never see those cruel people again.
korean_text: 네가 강포한 백성을 보지 아니하리라 그 백성은 방언이 어려워 네가 알아듣지 못하며 말이 이상하여 네가 깨닫지 못하는 자니라

sentences.original_text: You will never see those cruel people again.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 다시는 그 잔인한 사람들을 볼 수 없을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: You could not understand their language.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들의 언어를 이해할 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They laughed at you with strange words.
